Description.SourceString: Equip your heroes with Weapons, Armor and Sidekicks to further improve their attributes and abilities. Earn Weapons and Armor by completing Battle Pass Challenges. Collect Gear Shards and use them to buy Weapons and Armor from the Ancient Factory. Assign heroes as Sidekicks to grant an extra passive ability to their mentor.
Description.LocalizedString: Equip your heroes with Weapons, Armor and Sidekicks to further improve their attributes and abilities. Earn Weapons and Armor by completing Battle Pass Challenges. Collect Gear Shards and use them to buy Weapons and Armor from the Ancient Factory. Assign heroes as Sidekicks to grant an extra passive ability to their mentor.
